name: Table Tennis+ - Ping Pong For Players Who Do Not Like To Lose!
name_original: Table Tennis+ - Ping Pong For Players Who Do Not Like To Lose!
description:
Do you love playing table tennis? Now you can do even on your iPhone or iPod.

You can play with your friends in a multiplayer mode or single player with the computer. You may also powerup your paddles and get more advanced ones.

It's FREE! Grap your copy now!
